systemInformation.name: opapp
systemInformation.databaseDriver: IBM Data Server Driver for JDBC and SQLJ 4.26.14

applicationStringKey.name: com.posten.wf.custom.create.issue.action.generic.error.message
applicationStringKey.value: Error occurredwhile executing Create Issue Action on the Questionnaire Assessment workflow. Please contact the system administrator.

applicationStringKey.name: com.posten.wf.custom.create.issue.action.no.kri.found.error.message
applicationStringKey.value: No KRI with KRI ID {0} was found for this Vendor.

applicationStringKey.name: com.posten.wf.custom.create.kri.action.email.body.kri.not.found.in.library
applicationStringKey.value:
Hi{0},
There is an issue on the KRI Library: the KRI having KRI ID {1} was not found.
This was detected by the Workflow Custom Action CA-02-KRI which was trying to create a KRI for Question Template Titled {2}, unde Questionnaire Template titled {3}.

Please let the system administrator know about this missing KRI.

applicationStringKey.name: com.posten.wf.custom.create.kri.action.email.body.missing.kri.id.on.question.template
applicationStringKey.value:
Hi,
The KRI ID is not set on a Question Template and because of that the Workflow Custom Action CA-02-KRI cannot create a KRI. Please ensure to set a KRI ID on the respective Question template.
You can find details below about Question Template and its parent Questionnaire Template: {0}

applicationStringKey.name: com.posten.wf.custom.create.kri.action.email.subject.kri.not.found.in.library
applicationStringKey.value: KRI not found in KRI Library

applicationStringKey.name: com.posten.wf.custom.create.kri.action.email.subject.missing.kri.id.on.question.template
applicationStringKey.value: Missing KRI Id on Question Template

applicationStringKey.name: com.posten.wf.custom.create.kri.action.generic.error.message
applicationStringKey.value: Create KRI Action on the Questionnaire Assessment workflow: please contact the system administrator about this error.

applicationString.name: com.posten.wf.custom.create.kri.action.email.body.kri.not.found.in.library
applicationString.value:
IBM OpenPages with Watson

Hi{0},
The KRI Library doesn't contain any KRI having KRI ID {1}. Because of this the KRI Create / Update workflow custom action cannot execute.

Please ask the system administrator to fix this:

  • either correct the KRI ID on the Question Template(so that it matches the KRI ID of a KRI in the KRI Library)
  • or add a new KRI in the KRI library, which has the KRI ID specified on the Question Template

Details are available below.

Question Template:

{1}

Questionnaire Template:

{2}

KRI Library Path:

/Library/KRI Library

This email was automatically generated by OpenPages with Watson.

applicationString.value:
IBM OpenPages with Watson

Hi {0},
There is no KRI ID set on a Question template and because of this the KRI Create / Update workflow custom action cannot execute.

Please ask the system administrator to set a KRI ID on the respective Question Template.

Details are available below.

{1}

Questionnaire Template:

{2}
